name: mptexd
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: If the domain of a function given by maps-to notation is a set, the function is a set. Deduction version of ~ mptexg . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
